Applicant : Gross, Elaine
School (district) : Idaho Home Learning Academy (Oneida 351 Idaho Home Learning Academy)
Role(s) : Special Education Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I love the outdoors and am a rockhound. Throughout the year, as a ham radio operator, I am net control for many events around Idaho, like the Riggins Jet Boat Race, IMTU Ultra Marathon, etc. As a special education teacher, I work with students with various needs. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am always trying to find ways to give back to others who help students. It will benefit students as a special education teacher hopefully be able to share what I learn during an externship with my students and the public. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
